00027 /* TCP port for Remote Desktop Protocol */
00028 #define TCP_PORT_RDP 3389
00029 
00030 #define DEFAULT_CODEPAGE        "UTF-8"
00031 #define WINDOWS_CODEPAGE        "UTF-16LE"
00032 
00033 /* ISO PDU codes */
00034 enum ISO_PDU_CODE
00035 {
00036         ISO_PDU_CR = 0xE0,      /* Connection Request */
00037         ISO_PDU_CC = 0xD0,      /* Connection Confirm */
00038         ISO_PDU_DR = 0x80,      /* Disconnect Request */
00039         ISO_PDU_DT = 0xF0,      /* Data */
00040         ISO_PDU_ER = 0x70       /* Error */
00041 };
00042 
00043 /* MCS PDU codes */
00044 enum MCS_PDU_TYPE
00045 {
00046         MCS_EDRQ = 1,           /* Erect Domain Request */
00047         MCS_DPUM = 8,           /* Disconnect Provider Ultimatum */
00048         MCS_AURQ = 10,          /* Attach User Request */
00049         MCS_AUCF = 11,          /* Attach User Confirm */
00050         MCS_CJRQ = 14,          /* Channel Join Request */
00051         MCS_CJCF = 15,          /* Channel Join Confirm */
00052         MCS_SDRQ = 25,          /* Send Data Request */
00053         MCS_SDIN = 26           /* Send Data Indication */
00054 };
00055

00059 #define TYPE_RDP_NEG_FAILURE    0x3

00129 /* RDP PDU codes */

00133         RDP_PDU_CONFIRM_ACTIVE = 3,
00134         RDP_PDU_REDIRECT = 4,   /* MS Server 2003 Session Redirect */

00136         RDP_PDU_DATA = 7
00137 };

00214 /* Raster operation masks */

00216 #define ROP2_P(rop3) ((rop3 & 0x3) | ((rop3 & 0x30) >> 2))

00219 #define ROP2_XOR        0x6

00710 /* Keymap flags */
00711 #define MapRightShiftMask   (1<<0)
00712 #define MapLeftShiftMask    (1<<1)
00713 #define MapShiftMask (MapRightShiftMask | MapLeftShiftMask)
00714 
00715 #define MapRightAltMask     (1<<2)
00716 #define MapLeftAltMask      (1<<3)
00717 #define MapAltGrMask MapRightAltMask
00718 
00719 #define MapRightCtrlMask    (1<<4)
00720 #define MapLeftCtrlMask     (1<<5)
00721 #define MapCtrlMask (MapRightCtrlMask | MapLeftCtrlMask)
00722 
00723 #define MapRightWinMask     (1<<6)
00724 #define MapLeftWinMask      (1<<7)
00725 #define MapWinMask (MapRightWinMask | MapLeftWinMask)
00726 
00727 #define MapNumLockMask      (1<<8)
00728 #define MapCapsLockMask     (1<<9)
00729 
00730 #define MapLocalStateMask   (1<<10)
00731 
00732 #define MapInhibitMask      (1<<11)
00733 
00734 #define MASK_ADD_BITS(var, mask) (var |= mask)
00735 #define MASK_REMOVE_BITS(var, mask) (var &= ~mask)
00736 #define MASK_HAS_BITS(var, mask) ((var & mask)>0)
00737 #define MASK_CHANGE_BIT(var, mask, active) (var = ((var & ~mask) | (active ? mask : 0)))
